main event: A sighting of several unidentified flying objects (UFOs) near Chicago in 1959.
interesting points: The witness was driving with his brother when they saw a flash in the sky and stopped to observe., The witness attempted to take a photograph, but the film broke and the negatives were lost., The witness sought assistance from the Air Force regarding their sighting and lost photograph., The sighting involved multiple UFOs as reported by the witness., The case file includes several letters regarding the analysis of the reported sighting.
sighted object: unidentified flying objects in the sky
